feed.title: GoDoxy Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.12.1
entry.content:
Breaking

  • Maxmind config moved from acl.maxmind to providers yaml # config.yml providers: maxmind: account_id: 123456 license_key: aaaa-bbbb-cccc
  • Notifications
    • ntfy.style is now format: valid values are markdown (default) and plain
    • format also applies to gotify now

New

  • Notifications
    • Cert renewal notification (for both success and failure)
    • Config load/reload failure
    • Retry for up to 10 times upon failure, base on severity
  • WebUI
    • Support light/dark variant icons
    • Use tags from selfh.st as default app categories
  • Access log
    • Tunable rotate_interval (default: 1h)

Changes

  • WebUI
    • Better categorize config file items in UI config editor
    • Icon searcher UI update
    • Better default icon and category detection
  • Access log
    • Move "Adjust buffer size" message to debug level
    • Omit zero values for rotation results
  • Improved error formatting
  • Small memory optimization

Fixes

  • WebUI
    • Fixed missing validation error box
    • Incorrect red line error indicator due to incorrect JSON schema
    • Slow authentication redirect
    • Config editor not loading files occasionally
    • Other UI bugs
  • Idle Sleep
    • No longer throws error after docker provider disconnection
  • OIDC
    • Enforce HTTPS redirection to fix occasional "missing oauth state" error

Roadmap

  • [x] Robot blocking with Captcha (f9a8aede206d757841292c712ce25a063589eff4)
  • [ ] Homepage widgets (qbittorrent, sonarr, radarr)
  • [ ] OIDC Bypass rules
  • [ ] Global OIDC

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.12.2
entry.content:
New

hCaptcha middleware: protect against bots by solving captcha challenge - site_key: hCaptcha site key - secret_key: hCaptcha secret key - session_expiry (default: 24h): session expiry

Signup for hCaptcha: https://dashboard.hcaptcha.com/signup?type=pro

Fixes

"Timeout waiting for maxmind db" on shutdown

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.12.3
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Suppress "no data available" sensor temperatures warnings
  • Discord notification being sent multiple times

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.13.0
entry.content:
New features / Changes

  • Web UI

  • Drag and drop to reorder apps or move to another category.

    https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/c1513314-1aca-49ca-aea2-e0c705d9a7af

  • Refined app hover tooltips: better layout and health checks details.

  • Refined "Proxies" page: groups providers into tabs.

  • Add option to display status bubbles on the left of the app icons, and now it is the default.

  • Better docker container logs page navigation with URL fragment #<container-id>.

  • Fixed an issue where context menu was not closed after opening "Edit App" dialog.

  • Middleware bypass rules (shared syntax with Rule based routing)

This allows protecting routes with OIDC while keeping API paths accessible (e.g. mobile apps, browser extensions, etc.).

yaml karakeep: ... labels: proxy.#1.middlewares.oidc.bypass: path /api/v1/*

  • Rules

  • Add route directive

    yaml entrypoint: middlewares: - use: oidc bypass: - route pocket-id

  • Add alternative logical AND operator & for rules

    yaml entrypoint: middlewares: - use: oidc bypass: - route immich & path /api/v1/*

  • Docker

  • Replace lscr.io/linuxserver/socket-proxy with ghcr.io/yusing/socket-proxy to fix Expected EOF error
  • Support autoconfiguration for containers with host network mode

  • GoDoxy Agents can now act as a docker socket proxy (not enabled by default)

    yaml services: agent: image: "{{.Image}}" container_name: godoxy-agent restart: always network_mode: host environment: AGENT_NAME: "{{.Name}}" AGENT_PORT: "{{.Port}}" AGENT_CA_CERT: "{{.CACert}}" AGENT_SSL_CERT: "{{.SSLCert}}" # use agent as a docker socket proxy: [host]:port # set LISTEN_ADDR to enable (e.g. 127.0.0.1:2375) LISTEN_ADDR: POST: false ALLOW_RESTARTS: false ALLOW_START: false ALLOW_STOP: false AUTH: false BUILD: false COMMIT: false CONFIGS: false CONTAINERS: false DISTRIBUTION: false EVENTS: true EXEC: false GRPC: false IMAGES: false INFO: false NETWORKS: false NODES: false PING: true PLUGINS: false SECRETS: false SERVICES: false SESSION: false SWARM: false SYSTEM: false TASKS: false VERSION: true VOLUMES: false volumes: - /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock - ./data:/app/data

  • Default config

    Amended default config file with added security headers and CloudflareRealIP middleware

    yaml entrypoint: # Below define an example of middleware config # 1. set security headers # 2. block non local IP connections # 3. redirect HTTP to HTTPS # middlewares: - use: CloudflareRealIP - use: ModifyResponse set_headers: Access-Control-Allow-Methods: GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE, OPTIONS, HEAD Access-Control-Allow-Headers: "*" Access-Control-Allow-Origin: "*" Access-Control-Max-Age: 180 Vary: "*" X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block Content-Security-Policy: "object-src 'self'; frame-ancestors 'self';" X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN Referrer-Policy: same-origin Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=63072000; includeSubDomains; preload

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.13.1
entry.content:
Changes & Fixes

  • Security: disallow TLS1.0/1.1
  • OIDC: "invalid oauth state" error for WebUI
